data.title: On this day in 1990, Octavio Paz received his Nobel Prize in literature. Enough of a reason, if you ask me, to dust off the following Paz...
data.meta_description:
58 likes, 0 comments - dieter_roelstraete on December 10, 2023: "On this day in 1990, Octavio Paz received his Nobel Prize in literature. Enough of a reason, if you ask me, to dust off the following Paz quote, which I love but don’t quite know what to make of, even after all these years: “”Art” is an invention of aesthetics, which in turn is an invention of philosophers… What we call art is a game.” Noted!
#octaviopaz @penguinclassics #nobelprize".
